summary: Well, THIS is interessting. being called ‘Hypocrite” by someone who was so admirative of my so call “draws” weeks ago, rebloging...
caption:
Well, THIS is interessting.

being called ‘Hypocrite” by someone who was so admirative of my so call “draws” weeks ago, rebloging my stuff, spreading in all around tumblr.


anyway, Thank you dear Bulle for reblogging my things, it’s sooooo kind of you. but I must bring some precisions here.

- for now, I’m going on my 34.

- second thing, I never lied about my drawing technics, because its more infography. I’m posting WIPs and aweful photomanips to explain it, and maybe giving ideas to other people who can afford a tablet (wacom, apple, the Samsung Tab S3 is pretty good too.). and look, I can draw stuff without it too =D !

- It’s not that I can’t write, obviously I can, its just I can’t make a fucking good plot. not everyone can be good for everything, bet you are not drawing ?

- I have been mean to one ONE fanfiction and only the author derserve apologies from me (if she want it), I can give you that. I can give you the fact that I should a shut my fucking mouth, but it doesn’t change the fact that anyone a serious proves on the plagitary stuff. so “classé sans suite” like we say.

- I have never personnally insulted someone on tumblr like you do.

- I never realised It required a degree to be into a fandom. (guess we’ll just have to insult new World of Warcraft Gamers producing art and materials because some of us are playing it for 13 years ?). I produce something, people are happy. and yes, I’m “stalking”, I’m tagging accounts, because, its the social media’s reason to be ? otherwise I could just let picture on my laptop, no ?

I don’t know how long I would be here. I gonna keep going and produce things until it’s not fun anymore, because we are all agree that we are only just here for fun and love.

keep rebloging my stuff if you want, I can understand if you love the art and not the artist. but insults are not welcome. I’m sorry you can’t throw me up of your dashboard like we do on facebook, truely, not my fault, I think we can continue to ignore each other, liking pictures if we want beacause, that’s why everyone are on tumblr.


sorry for mistakes on words, English’s not my natural language.

summary: Portfolio
title: Portfolio
body:
A somewhat comprehensive showcase of my completed works, along with a few sketches and examples of character design, posing, etc.

A majority of my usual work consist of sketches, so don’t expect to see too much of that here. I will, however, be sharing files as well, as “behind the scenes” things that might be of interest to some people.

View On WordPress
